naturalfertilizer:blockdesc-dung-*: Scoop it up with a shovel and make useful fertilizers.
naturalfertilizer:itemdesc-manure: Fresh manure from herbivores. Can be used to make fertilizers.
game:manure-handbook-help-text: Fresh manure is collected from herbivores such as pigs, sheep and goats. It can be used to make weak fertilizer by stacking a manure pile and then adding grass to start fermentation. For stronger fertilizer, can also be mixed in a barrel with water to create manure slurry, and mix with grass for mature fertilizer.
naturalfertilizer:blockdesc-smallpoop-*: Scoop it up with a shovel and make useful fertilizers.
naturalfertilizer:blockdesc-chickenpoop-: Scoop it up with a shovel and make useful fertilizers.
naturalfertilizer:itemdesc-weakfertilize: A weak fertilizer made from fresh manure. Can be applied to soil to improve fertility.
game:weakfertilizer-handbook-help-text: A weak fertilizer made from fresh manure. Can be applied to soil to improve fertility. Can be made by stacking a manure pile and adding grass to start fermentation.
naturalfertilizer:itemdesc-maturefertili: A medium fertilizer made from manure slurry. Can be applied to soil to greatly improve fertility.
game:maturefertilizer-handbook-help-text: A medium fertilizer made from manure slurry mixed with grass and fermented in a barrel. Can be applied to soil to greatly improve fertility.
naturalfertilizer:blockdesc-weakfertiliz: Break down with a shovel into weak fertilizer items.
game:manurepile-handbook-help-text: A pile of fresh manure. Add grass to start fermentation, to produce weak fertilizer.
naturalfertilizer:blockdesc-manure-fresh: A pile of fresh manure. Add grass to start fermentation, to produce weak fertilizer.
game:manureslurryportion-handbook-help-t: A portion of manure slurry, made by mixing fresh manure with water. Can be mixed with grass to create Mixed manure slurry.
game:manuremixportion-handbook-help-text: A portion of mixed manure slurry, made by mixing manure slurry with grass. Can be fermented in a barrel to create Medium fertilizer.
naturalfertilizer:incontainer-itemdesc-m: A portion of manure slurry, made by mixing fresh manure with water. Can be mixed with grass in a barrel, to create Mixed manure slurry.
A portion of mixed manure slurry, made by mixing manure slurry with grass. Can be fermented in a barrel to create Medium fertilizer.
